name: Richard Miller
description:
I am an easygoing person, caring , loving, cool, calm, kind, generous, faithful, honest, discipline, humble, God fearing and I’m more interested in spiritual happiness than material gain. I try to remain as humble as possible. I’m no saint by any means but It is important to me. I love children,I’m childlike, love to laugh and joke, keep things light and count my blessing. I don’t drink much, but don’t hold it against any one who does, It’s their choice and I don’t judge them, just want them to be themselves. Let’s talk. But at this point in my life I’m waiting for the total package,a companion, friend and a loving woman.
l am a kind and fun-loving person who wishes to meet someone with those same qualities. I would like someone who is passionate about life and wants to take it to it’s fullest, someone who cares about other people, someone who enjoys spending time with and showing affection to their partner, someone who likes to pamper and be pampered, and someone who likes to laugh.
